name: George Women's Short Sleeve Maxi Chemise

reviews.name: George Women's Short Sleeve Maxi Chemise
reviews.reviewText: What I love is the material, its not too clingy, perfect weight. I love the length too. Cutest Maxie !! I love throwing it on everyday after work.
reviews.title: so comfy

reviews.name: George Women's Short Sleeve Maxi Chemise
reviews.reviewText: I love how it feels. The price is a little more than I usually pay for sleepwear, but is still affordable.
reviews.title: great buy

reviews.name: George Women's Short Sleeve Maxi Chemise
reviews.reviewText: At first I was a little unsure about this purchase but, I was vet surprised! I love this nightwear. The fit is true to size ands is very flattering wear around the house. Nice, soft and comfy. I wear it often, washed it on delicate cycle, mild liquid detergent(He), cold water. Normal dry, gain sheet and it comes out beautiful every time! Good Job on this one Walmart!
reviews.title: A Nice Surprise!
